name: What Role Am I Playing?
description: A module that suggests a random raid build to play next based on a role you select. Perfect for indecisive commanders!

account.details: Required to access your account information and track your current activities

characters.details: Required to access character information and track what character you're playing

unlocks.details: Required to track account unlocks and achievements

builds.details: Required to track build changes and specializations

progression.details: Required to track character progression and level changes
